thread.section_title: Aero Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Simply WOW.
thread.title_full: Simply WOW. - Review of Aero Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Jannat S
title: Simply WOW.
text:
Having seen so many budget hotels in Paris, nothing surprises me anymore, as 99% of them are old, worn out, often filthy and with poor internet signal.
However this one did pleasantly surprise me because the room was large enough, very clean, bed comfy, and had a large bathroom too! And wifi was ok too.
Excellent value for the money! I will come back.
